post:
I have a 128MB/128MB, 1 core, 15GB HDD, 500GB BW BuyVM yearly with 7 months left in Las Vegas that I no longer need and I'm looking to sell it at a discounted price of $7.

You do need to be an active BuyVM customer to receive the transfer and meet the criteria in section 4.2 here: https://my.frantech.ca/tos.php (active with at least three months of continuous service history, no unpaid or overdue invoices, no TOS/AUP Violations on record).

`(Thanks @Dylan I copied your post format.)`
